script.caption: A sheep with a gold chain around its neck is standing in a field.

dialogue.text: In a whimsical world, a sheep wanders into a bank, curiously clutching a wallet overflowing with cash.

script.caption: A person teaching class looking at a blackboard

dialogue.text: This is why I dedicate myself to the study of sheep all around the world.

script.caption: A man looking at sheep eating grass

dialogue.text: Otherwise, we cannot figure out mankinds greatest mysteries, a sheep with too much cash.
